column1: SECTION 6: CYCLING - Temperature-Based Defaults (Road Cycling Gear)
SECTION 8: CROSS COUNTRY SKIING - Temperature-Based Defaults (XC Specific)
SECTION 9: WEATHER CONDITION OVERRIDES (Applied After Temperature Defaults)
These overrides are applied when specific weather conditions are detected:

column2: rainGear → Waterproof jacket (if cold) or Light rain jacket (if warm)
rainGear → Waterproof jacket (if cold) or Light rain jacket (if warm)
outerLayer → Rain jacket AND bottoms → Rain pants
outerLayer → Rain jacket AND accessories → Umbrella

column1: DARK/NIGHT OVERRIDES (applied if before sunrise or after sunset)

column2: accessories → Lights + vest AND eyewear → Clear glasses

column1: SECTION 10: SMART SAFETY OVERRIDES (Applied to History-Based Recommendations)
These additional safety checks apply when historical data suggests inappropriate clothing:

column2: Shorts or Capris or Short shorts
Shorts or Capris or Short shorts
